name: Roguelike Remaster Alpha
description:
Roguelike Remaster Alpha 1.0.9 Rolling edition

Controls:

Keyboard:

  • Arrows/Space = movement/jumping
  • F = pickup items
  • Q = attack
  • W = use potion
  • E = use spell slot #1
  • R = roll

Potions:

  • Health potion - restores 20 HP, 2 max charges
  • Mana potion - restores 25 MP, 2 max charges
  • Mixed potion - restores 15 HP & MP, 3 max charges

Spells:

  • Justice - drops JUSTICE on the nearest enemy
  • Freeze - freezes for 3 secs and damages all visible enemies
  • Shadow cloak - invisible, invincible and faster for 5 secs, attacking cancels cloak
